title: They're cutting it real CLOSE! - ORIGIN CHRONOS
tags: I thought the PSU would DIE!
I can't believe it didn't die
description: Thanks to Origin for sponsoring today's video! To learn more about the ORIGIN PC CHRONOS and Intel's 12th-Generation processors, click here:    Origin is a big player in the pre-built market for high-performance gaming desktops, and they wanted us to check out their Chronos line, a small-for-factor system. We were worried since this one uses an i9-12900k and a 3080 Ti with a 750W PSU, so we needed to see if it could survive if we pushed its limits.   GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS ---------------------------------------------------   0:00 - We got a crate 0:10 - Video games lied to us 0:45 - Unboxing 1:33 - Customization 1:47 - Disassembly 2:18 - PSU thoughts 3:20 - Build quality 4:06 - Case impressions 4:25 - Power the system on 4:56 - Temperature and stress testing 7:25 - Cooling and airflow thoughts 8:18 - Gaming performance impressions 9:20 - RGB iCUE thoughts 9:40 - Final thoughts
